TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventLogLink extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a link between an event provider and an event log that the provider publishes events into. This object cannot be instantiated.
Gets the localized name of the event log.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the localized name of the event log.

Docs.summary: Gets a Boolean value that determines whether the event log is imported, rather than defined in the event provider. An imported event log is defined in a different provider.
Docs.value: Returns `true` if the event log is imported by the event provider, and returns `false` if the event log is not imported by the event provider.

Docs.summary: Gets the non-localized name of the event log associated with this object.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the non-localized name of the event log associated with this object.
